patterns.description: 29 programming language tags generate 12.7M questions (438K avg each), while 56K 'Other' tags average only 742 questions
DevOps has lowest documentation rate (50.8%), followed by Frontend Frameworks (53.4%) and Cloud Platform (60.9%)
Data Science/ML has high avg questions per tag (5,317) suggesting concentrated, active domain

observations: Programming languages dominate with 438K avg questions/tag vs 742 for uncategorized tags - 590x difference
DevOps has the worst documentation coverage (50.8%) indicating an underserved niche for contributions
Data Science/ML shows high avg engagement (5,317 questions/tag) with only 122 tags - concentrated expertise area
Frontend frameworks have 1,239 tags but only 53.4% documentation - fast-evolving space with knowledge gaps
